value:
This is a fine castle, full of history
and style. Perhaps not as grand as
Altea Castle, but that's a high bar...

King Cornelius, you should know
that Prince Marth has matured
into a fine man...

Exemplary patrolling! Next time,
I shall accompany you—don't
think I can't keep up!

I could regale you with the history
of Altea and Prince Marth's deeds...
but we would be here for days.

It seems I've injured my back.
Would you be so kind as to press
hard just there?

You are $Nu?$k$pI bring kindest greetings
from $Nf.

Hmph. It would appear I'm still
good for something.
Only natural for a paladin of Altea.

I have dishonored my rank and
my country.

To think I still had new tricks to
learn...

I am Jagen of the knights of Altea,
Prince Marth's guardian. I will thank
you not to treat me like an old man.

I have served many years as a
knight, but never have I met
someone quite like you.$k$pDo we all follow you because you
summoned us? I think not. At
least not solely.$k$pThere is something about you that
inspires others to fight for you.
I can't put it into words...$k$pIt reminds me a bit of Prince Marth,
who also naturally draws heroes
to his cause.$k$pIn any case, I sincerely wish to
spend what days I have left
fighting at your side.
ふんっ！
ぬぅんっ！
ぬおおっ！
Not good!
Clear the way!
I'm not finished yet!
Do not turn your back on me!
For Prince Marth!
Pitiful...
Hm
Did you need something of me?
I will never understand the young...
You are young, but I see wisdom in your eyes.
These old bones can be of service to you yet.
I won't be outdone by any of those young striplings!
I wonder how many more battles I have in me...
Take care not to worry your elders. We know best.
Hmm.
Your servant.
Hya!
